meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the growth of tumors.
meanings.sent1: The antitumoral medication helped stop the tumor from growing.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed an antitumoral drug to slow down the tumor's growth.
meanings.sent3: The antitumoral treatment was like a superhero fighting against the tumor invasion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight cancer was as strong as an antitumoral shield.
meanings.sent5: The power of the antitumoral therapy was evident in the shrinking tumor size.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that inhibits the growth of tumors.
meanings.sent1: She received an antitumoral to help combat the tumor.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided antitumorals to patients undergoing cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The antitumoral injection felt like a tiny warrior attacking the tumor.
meanings.sent4: The antitumoral effect was like a force field protecting against tumor growth.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of the antitumoral drug was a breakthrough in cancer research.
